attributes.action: Make Weddings in line with Stage 3 of "Roadmap" for easing COVID-19 restrictions
attributes.additional_details: Many couples have postponed weddings already (from 2020 into 2021) and now a wedding is being treated significantly different to a 'Large Event' with the cap of 30 people in place well after fans can return to stadiums and cinemas. With a defined guest list and significant impact upon the hospitality sector, the allowing of a more 'normal' wedding as part of Stage 3 would bring hope to many.
attributes.background: Remove the cap on wedding and guest attendance at weddings as part of 'Stage 3' of the Roadmap for easing COVID-19 restrictions, or at least treat weddings as " Large Events" that allow a greater capacity based upon venue capacity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576593
